title: HELP PLZ
body:
IF anyone could help would be great!


cant open league because it says "bugsplat failed to download" also "libcurl.dll" "libssl-1_1.dll"

replies.body:
Some of the client files might have been corrupted somehow, but typically we can fix it up pretty easily. Refer to the image below for a specific file to delete and for which file you should run afterward. Let me know if that doesn't help!

https://i.gyazo.com/6d6979153e1c7386e01fbc35faedf321.png
